briefdescription.para: Parses a string containing a pair of doubles.

simplesect.para: A vector of doubles containing the parsed values.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the interval of a given value within a specified length.

detaileddescription.para: The interval is calculated by adding half of the length to the value, taking the modulo of the sum with the length, and subtracting half of the length.

parameterdescription.para: The value for which the interval is calculated.

simplesect.para: The interval of the value within the specified length.

briefdescription.para: Calculates the distance to a wall and the closest point on the wall from a given point.

parameterdescription.para: The first vertex of the wall segment.
The second vertex of the wall segment.
The point for which the distance and closest point are calculated.

simplesect.para: A pair containing the distance to the wall and the closest point on the wall.

detaileddescription.para: Calculates the Euclidean distance between two points in a 2D space lattice.

parameterdescription.para: The coordinates of the first point.
The coordinates of the second point.

simplesect.para: The Euclidean distance between the two points.
